name: RuneScript
description:
Runescript is a Deckbuilder Bullet Hell designed for and created entirely in 7 day roguelike 2022, from March 5 to March 11. Build a deck with 24 unique attacks,passives,boons. Duck and Dodge the attacks from 4 unique enemies, and get ready to fight back.

enemy waves are randomly generated, as well as your starting deck and the deck additions. 

All art was created during the 7 day period. other the storm cloud, which was drawn by Dakota Vaughan (https://www.youtube.com/c/DakotaVaughan), all art was created by me. 

Almost all programing was done during the seven day period by me, with limited exceptions:

the menu system - I used a template I created before 7drl to get started
enemy movement behavior - I used a tutorial series, so the system isn't _mine_ persay

sound and music was not created by me, nor was it created in the 7 day window

music was created by FxeKeen for one of my other projects

sound was taken from freesound.org

I hope you enjoy the game. If you want to see me continue developing it, leave a comment either here or on my youtube channel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDaoHwvpcU81zft_cjI4e8w), as well as subscribe. Devlog for the game will be coming soon
